body: this has some primal charm, and is actually quite accurate. what else would you do in your free time except fucking like the rabbits
That's why i don't blacklist scat tag, cuz in this case i just delete 23-26 pictures for example and voila...it becomes a real gem, all the way to go!

This one has touched me in more places than most dojinshi do. Truly a work of art. I don't even like scat category even then it was made with perfection. From animal caveman behaviour to textures and shading. Bought the dojinshi to life unlike other artists who are mostly going for chibi. Thank you for gracing my eyes with such beauty
